App Name: Photo Maker Package Name: com.genius.gifMaster.gp

Brief:

Photo Maker is a versatile and user-friendly GIF creation tool that turns everyday moments into shareable animations. Offering a suite of features for creating and editing GIFs, Photo Maker stands out with its impressive functionality that enables you to transform your screen recordings, images, and even videos into GIFs. Additionally, it packs editing tools to enhance and personalize your GIFs with text, emojis, and more, without the hassle of watermarks.
